list.li: Good News! God's Kingdom has come near! (MRK 1:15)
Parables about the mystery of God's kingdom (MRK MRK 4)
What does it mean for Jesus to be the Messiah? (MRK 8b-10)
Conversation #1: Who do you say I am? (MRK 8:27-38)
Conversation #2: Following Jesus is like dying (MRK 9:30-37)
Conversation #3: ...To give his life as a ransom for many. (MRK 10:32-45)
The man was the son of God (MRK 15:39)
They fled from the tomb in terror (MRK 16:8)
